title: Gala Slacks
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: gala_slacks
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $777.9K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Gala Slacks. The average
  contract duration was 2.54 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $547.6K. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.3M.
lookup_name: 'GALA SLACKS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '777.9K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '9'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '78%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '108%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.29'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.54'
s421_mean_contract_value: '547.6K'
s425_max_duration: '4'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.3M'
---
